definition: to follow one's heart's desires/to do as one pleases (idiom)
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]

sentences.english: A man's worst difficulties begin when he is able to do as he likes. (T. H. Huxley)
sentences.chinese: 一个人最大的难关是从他可以随心所欲开始的。

sentences.english: Nobel Literary Prize Down to Merit, Not Judges' Whim.
sentences.chinese: 诺贝尔文学奖论功封赏，非评判随心所欲。

sentences.english: You can hate the wireless carriers all you want.
sentences.chinese: 你可以随心所欲地憎恨那些无线运营商。

sentences.english: Traceless is a kind of attitude to life, arbitrary, go with the flow.
sentences.chinese: 无痕是一种生活态度，随心所欲，顺其自然。

sentences.english: I've gone off on my own.
It is said that a Greek sea-god could appear in the form of any creature he wished.
sentences.chinese: 据说希腊的海神能随心所欲地以任何动物的样子出现。

sentences.english: She could do anything she wanted. This washer night.
sentences.chinese: 她可以做自己想做的任何事，随心所欲的夜晚。

sentences.english: They can be placed upon the object, and later deleted, at will.
sentences.chinese: 可以随心所欲地将这些属性放在对象上并在以后删除。

sentences.english: She that deep basic skill and excellent craft stagewise are follow one's inclinations .
sentences.chinese: 她那深厚的基本功和高超的技艺在舞台上随心所欲。

sentences.english: Metallics are the new neutrals, and you can wear them with whatever you want.
sentences.chinese: 金属饰品现在是中性的，你可以随心所欲地戴它们。

sentences.english: The design of human nature, a dual-use , whim.
sentences.chinese: 人性化的设计，一款两用，随心所欲。

sentences.english: Tool can rotate freely infinite, processing is follow one's inclinations.
sentences.chinese: 刀具可以无限自由旋转，使得加工随心所欲。

sentences.english: And they can adjust their schedules as they like.
sentences.chinese: 同时他们可以随心所欲的安排行程表。

sentences.english: Those pearls have supernatural power which can make your dreams cone true.
sentences.chinese: 宝珠有神奇力量，可以呼风唤雨，随心所欲。

sentences.english: She lied freely from that moment on.
sentences.chinese: 从那一时刻，她开始随心所欲地撒谎撂屁。

sentences.english: The ideal lips form of description that can follow one's inclinations.
sentences.chinese: 能随心所欲的描绘理想唇形。

definition: whatever you like/to do as one pleases
free and unconstrained (idiom); unfettered/unbuttoned/without care or worries
lit. what the heart wishes, the hand accomplishes (idiom) skilled at the job/entirely in one's element/going smoothly and easily
as one wishes/according to one's wishes/at will/voluntary/conscious
handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
like a heavenly steed, soaring across the skies (idiom)/(of writing, calligraphy etc) bold and imaginative/unconstrained in style
to have a fluent command of (idiom)
